turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez. I've been trying to call for days, but I keep getting stuck on hold. It's so frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can certainly help you schedule that appointment. To begin, can you please provide your full name, date of birth, and insurance provider?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's Jane Doe, date of birth is 03/15/1988, and my insurance is Blue Cross Blue Shield. What's Dr. Ramirez's availability looking like for the next two weeks? And is it possible to get an appointment before 3pm? I have kids to pick up from school.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I see several openings. Dr. Ramirez is available next Tuesday at 10:00 AM and next Thursday at 1:30 PM. There's also an opening the following Monday at 4:00 PM. Will any of those times work for you? Unfortunately, all appointments before 3pm are currently booked solid for the next 2 weeks. I recommend booking the 1:30PM next Thursday if the early afternoon appointment is a must.
